
Changelog
=========

0.1.4 (2015-07-28)
------------------

* Bugfix related to checking for API conflicts

0.1.3 (2015-07-28)
------------------

* Added more tests and 'CollectionMixin' that exposes an 'iterate' api

0.1.2 (2015-07-27)
------------------

* Implemented 'plugin configuration' update API

0.1.1 (2015-07-24)
------------------

* Package structure updated

0.1.0 (2015-07-23)
------------------

* First release on PyPI.
